channel.title: United Nations: North Korea Nuclear Technology
channel.description: In class we've been studying the United Nations. Each of us got assigned a country, and I got North Korea. So basically, I'm supposed to be finding information on why the United Nations formed the sub committee of Nuclear Technology (yes, i know it's stupid). I've done 3+ hours of research on the internet and through books and found nothing. If any of you guys can find anything, that would be much appreciated.

item.title: United Nations: North Korea Nuclear Technology
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

I’m thinking I may do that, I’m going to look one last time this weekend, and if I don’t find anything, I’ll just say that,

Read full topic
item.source: United Nations: North Korea Nuclear Technology
